title: Environmental Medicine & Detox Program - Fresno Holistic Medicine
description: In this day and age it is nearly impossible to avoid chemicals and toxins, and it certainly doesn't help that we reside in the Central Valley. Environmental medicine focuses on...
cleaned_text: In this day and age it is nearly impossible to avoid chemicals and toxins, and it certainly doesn't help that we reside in the Central Valley. Environmental medicine focuses on supporting the body's detoxification pathways reducing the body's toxin and chemical burdens.
